Title: Rudderless
Overview: A grieving father in a downward spiral stumbles across a box of his recently deceased son's demo tapes and lyrics. Shocked by the discovery of this unknown talent, he forms a band in the hope of finding some catharsis.
Tagline: The way back begins with a single chord.
production_companies: Unified Pictures, Amberdale Productions, Tee Rob Pictures
Cast: Billy Crudup, Anton Yelchin, Felicity Huffman
clean_text: rudderless grieve father downward spiral stumble box recently decease son demo tape lyric shock discovery unknown talent form band hope find catharsis way begin single chord music drama comedy william h macy billy crudup anton yelchin felicity huffman 2014
